title: Durban student in court for murder of 'close friend'
text:
A 25-year-old University of KwaZulu-Natal (UKZN) student is expected to appear in the Pinetown Magistrate's Court on Monday for the murder of a fellow student.

The student was arrested on Saturday morning after he was spotted near smoke in a bushy area, close to the UKZN's Westville campus, at 01:30.

READ: Durban student arrested after burnt body of 'close friend' discovered

The murdered student, 24-year-old Samkelo Zondi, was reported missing on Wednesday.

According to EWN, campus security officials arrested the man after they saw that he emerged from the bushes.

On further investigation, a body was found, burning in the bushes.
description: A 25-year-old University of KwaZulu-Natal student is expected to appear in the Pinetown Magistrate's Court for the murder of a fellow student.
